channel.title: Need help with error ! Admin on my server + Rep++
channel.description:
Im adding this, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,36618.0.html
When i add the code below the sendMessage("Bad emote ID") I get 1 error when compiling.
client.java:9952: 'else' without 'if' else if <command.equalsIgnoreCase<"kalphite">> ^ 1 error

item.title: Need help with error ! Admin on my server + Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Staccia Staccia
item.description:
@Staccia wrote:

ill give u my kalphite queen code, hold on[br][size=1]Posted at: November 15, 2006, 01:08:08 AM[/size][hr] else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kqueen")) { teleportToX = 3487; teleportToY = 9493; }its as fuckin simple as that, you dont need all that fancy shit and in your code, i dont see anything on where to teleport you -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with error ! Admin on my server + Rep++
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

too frekin funny. L O L H A X just DELETE that code and re-add the stuff from the tutorial:

}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kalphite"))
{
if (absY <= 3000)
{	
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is currently at the Kalphites, ::kalphite");
showInterface(99999999); // The Kalphite Global Message - By Doobie
disconnected = true;
}
else 
{
sendMessage("Welcome to the Kalphites!");
sendMessage("www.MegaTuts.co.nr");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is currently at the Kalphites, ::kalphite");
MainHelpMenu();
}
}

item.title: Need help with error ! Admin on my server + Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Newbi Newbi
item.description:
@Newbi wrote:

Use this.

Search for this…

Code:
sendMessage(“Bad emote ID”);
Right below that add this…

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kalphite")) { if (absY <= 3000) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is currently at the Kalphites, ::kalphite"); showInterface(99999999); // The Kalphite Global Message - By Doobie disconnected = true; } else { sendMessage("Welcome to the Kalphites!"); sendMessage("www.MegaTuts.co.nr"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is currently at the Kalphites, ::kalphite"); MainHelpMenu(); } }

Basically, make sure you did it right
